import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; class Table extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { index: null, hashValues: ['X', 'O'], tab11: false, tab12: false, tab13: false, tab21: false, tab22: false, tab23: false, tab31: false, tab32: false, tab33: false, } } changeStateValue(index, tabValue) { this.setState({ index: index === null ? 0 : 1, tabvalue: this.state.hashValues[this.state.index], }); } render() { return (
this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, this.state.tab11)}>

{this.state.tab11}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab12}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab13}
this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab21}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab22}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab23}
this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab31}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab32}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index)}>

{this.state.tab33}
); } } export default Table;
